---
title: "Report on Automatic Versus Manual Transmission Cars"
author: "M Williams"
date: "21 August 2014"
output: pdf_document
---
```{r}
boxplot(mpg ~ am, data=mtcars)
```   

````{r}
t.test(mpg ~ am, data=mtcars)
```  

```{r}
fit <- lm(mpg ~ ., data = mtcars)
summary(fit)$coef
```  

```{r results='hide'}
fit1 <- step(fit,  direction="backward")
```  

```{r}
summary(fit1)$coef
```  

```{r}
plot(fit1, which=2)
```
